title: The Witch
description: The world is shaken. Consequences are dealt. Enemies lurk in every corner. After leaving the Free Lands, Melas arrives in Laxis and slowly tries to establishes herself as a Hunter. Her magic is still a curse, yet it can be a blessing. Especially with the rise of the Abomination threat. And now that she has made enemies, between the Church and the Dark Crusaders, she will have to watch her back for those coming after her.
author: V.A. Lewis
